mdRecord.dcterms:description: Entrance door, north elevation, showing plaque: "Washington Literary Society -- 1869" above doorway

Addition to north end of Hotel constructed ca. 1870. From 1869 to 1929, headquarters of the Washington Literary and Debating Society. Now houses offices of the Office of Equal Opportunity Programs. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
